keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase in the value of the state pension, linking it to earnings.
Make saving for a personal pension worthwhile and eliminate compulsory annuity rule.
Freeze council tax for the next two years in partnership with the council.
Help people protect their home rather than having to sell it to pay for care, raise inheritance tax threshold to £1 million.
Protect the NHS budget as the top priority.

issues.economy: Detailed plans to stop the waste in government bureaucracy and extravagance of politicians.
issues.health: Protect the NHS budget as the number one priority.
issues.socialWelfare: Support for pensioners, increasing state pension, and assisting with personal pension savings.

housing.content: Help people protect their home rather than having to sell it to pay for care, and raise inheritance tax threshold to £1 million.
